properties.name: SiteTitle
properties.caption: Main Hub Site Title
properties.description: The title for the main hub site site

properties.name: SiteUrl
properties.caption: Main Hub Site URL
properties.description: The relative URL to be used for the site

properties.name: LiveSiteTitle
properties.caption: Live @ Contoso Site Title
properties.description: The title for the Live @ Contoso site which will be associated to the main hubsite

properties.name: LiveSiteUrl
properties.caption: Live @ Contoso Site URL
properties.description: The relative URL for the Live @ Contoso site

properties.name: GiveSiteTitle
properties.caption: Give @ Contoso Site Title
properties.description: The title for the Give @ Contoso site which will be associated to the main hubsite

properties.name: GiveSiteUrl
properties.caption: Give @ Contoso Site URL
properties.description: The relative URL for the Give @ Contoso site

properties.name: TeamSiteTitle
properties.caption: Give Planning Team Site Title
properties.description: The title for the Give Planning Team site site which will be associated to the main hubsite

properties.name: TeamSiteAlias
properties.caption: Give Planning Team Site Alias
properties.description: The alias for the Give Planning Team O365 Group to create. The site URL will be /sites/<alias> or /teams/<alias> depending on your Tenant settings.
